table.name: vtiger_messages
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_messages` ( `messagesid` int(11) NOT NULL, `messages_no` varchar(56) NOT NULL, `messagesname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `messagestype` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `messagesrelatedto` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `msg_campaign` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `clicked` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `dropped` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `bounce` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `open` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `delivered` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `no_mail` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `unsubscribe` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `spamreport` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `status_message` varchar(25) DEFAULT NULL, `lasturlclicked` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `account_message` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `contact_message` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `lead_message` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `campaign_message` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `email_tplid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`messagesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_messagescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_messagescf` ( `messagesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`messagesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
